title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 137.2 - Storage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 137.2 - Storage

State Regulations
(a) Unissued stocks
of hypodermic syringes and needles shall be kept in double locked cabinets or
rooms, under protection of suitable locks and keys. Cabinets shall be
stationary. (b) Other hypodermic
syringes and needles not in use shall be kept under suitable, locked
protection. (c) In no instance
shall spring or combination dial locks be employed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
137.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
